Title: Successive Attacks
description: Roll 2D for each fighter that scored a hit in its initial attack to determine its new attack position
notes: Any fighter which scores a hit in its initial attack (even if the hit has no effect) attacks the B-17 again.
After all fighters conducting successive attacks are positioned, remove the number of fighters allowed due to successful fighter cover according to the roll on Table M-4 during the initial attack.
Fighters which score a hit during their first successive attack conduct a second successive attack.
After its second successive attack, a fighter is removed from play, even if it scored hits every time.
